articles.author: Charles Bradley
articles.title: IndyCar Nashville: Kirkwood wins by 0.7s after late red flag - Autosport
articles.description: Andretti Autosport’s Kyle Kirkwood took his second IndyCar victory of the season on the streets of Nashville as series leader Alex Palou extended his advantage over Josef Newgarden with third.
articles.content: Kirkwood finished 0.7633s ahead of Team Penskes polewinner Scott McLaughlin and series dominator Palou (Chip Ganassi Racing). The race was red-flagged in the closing stages for a multi-car pileup, bu… [+5561 chars]

articles.author: Abhishek Mukherjee
articles.title: ‘The system’s wrong and needs looking at’ – Stuart Broad unhappy with England’s 19-point penalty - Wisden
articles.description: Speaking for the first time since his sudden retirement from Test cricket, Stuart Broad elaborated on the timing of his decision to call it quits.
articles.content:
In an exclusive interview days after his sudden retirement from Test cricket, Stuart Broad elaborated on the timing of his decision to call it quits.
Stuart Broad had not hinted at retirement before… [+1919 chars]
